AirShield.app


AirShield is an innovative app developed to address the health risks faced by individuals living in air pollution-prone areas.
The app's mission was inspired by the harmful emissions of a local factory, which led to increased cancer rates and premature deaths in the neighborhood.

Using real-time data, AirShield alerts users if polluted air is approaching and provides information on the specific components present in the air.
It advises on window openings, outdoor activities, and suggests optimal locations to minimize pollution intake.

Backed by scientific research, AirShield empowers users to make informed decisions about their well-being. The app has received positive feedback and numerous requests for expansion, demonstrating its effectiveness in combating pollution.


Made for mobile

Your shield
against polluted air

WHY USE AIRSHIELD

Protect Your Lungs

Enable healthy individuals to safeguard their health by choosing to breath clean air.

Protect Children's Health

Helps parents monitor air pollution levels,
ensuring a safe environment for their children to play and grow.

Prevent Long-Term Diseases

Minimize air pollution exposure,
reducing the risk of chronic health conditions for a healthier future.

FEATURES

Visual map of polluted zone

Current amount of air particles

Local air zone with change countdown

AirShield advises based on scientific studies

Hourly data
to make safe decisions

Daily average data
to plan future outdoor activities

Clean or polluted arrows
for quick visual confirmation

RESEARCH

Uses wind calculations and medical studies
to calculate and visualise safe data

All studies are publicly available
